<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ColumnStatsAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>ColumnStatsAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var ColumnStatsAjax = Class.create(); ColumnStatsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

type: 'ColumnStatsAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>matt.bohy</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-02-22 20:40:34</sys_created_on> <sys_id>478b24e23b013200a879ad6834efc437</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ColumnStatsAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Column Statistics" source="com.glide.column_statistics">93ddf0cb6d2220100acb70b35343302a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_478b24e23b013200a879ad6834efc437</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>matt.bohy</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-02-23 02:45:00</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>226</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
